title: For loops
text: When running this for loop, what is the next value of c?

title: For loops conditional
text: After finding c, you go to the next line: is c < 2? If so, compute the body. If not, move to the else statement, and compute the body.

title: np.arange()
text: What is the fourth value in np.arange(5)?

title: For loops
text: Since c is not less than $$2$$, we move to the else body. Ask yourself, is c % $$2$$ $$==$$ 1? If so, print the statement. Else, print the other statement.
